course_title: Technology, Virtual Worlds, and Digital Visual Culture in Art Education

62A.comments: This is a PDCE administered course for KTY3. Restricted to students in the course. This is a blended course with part of the course held at WKTEP in Nelson, BC and part of the course will be online.

description: Foundations and conflicting conceptions of digital visual culture and art education. Theory and practice in the development and implementation of art education technology.
